Articles.Content:
Hello there fellow KSP players!

I'm nano, I am a Paleo-enthusiast which pretty much means I love dinosaurs and anything related to that.

I've been playing Kerbal Space Program since the Steam Summer Sale and I must say that it is quite a lot of fun. I am still a noob and constantly pester my friends for tips and such, but I'm slowly getting there. The reason why I ended up here is that I was directed by M.Wolfy, and some of you probably know him by now.

I may not be around much but I'll do my best to keep up-to-date with everything.

EDIT: Let's just remove that little stuff up.

Edited September 30, 2013 by nanotyrano
Hi there nano, welcome to the forums! Unfortunately we can't see your avatar yet because you need 5 posts before you can add an avatar to your account.

I am still a noob and constantly pester my friends for tips and such, but I'm slowly getting there. The reason why I ended up here is that I was directed by M.Wolfy, and some of you probably know him by now.

Did you HAVE to mention me.

Well this is embarrasing.

Anyway, thank you for the warm welcome Kasper! And yes Wolfy, I did.
